mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Wow that was quick! Have you done this before?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: One of the more useful things you get to learn in the military is findin’ a way to eat and sleep pretty much anywhere. Done this more times than I can count bud.

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Huh, I’ve never learned anything like that. Maybe I should have gone to the military.

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Well then, I guess you should watch and learn then. Speakin’ of learnin’ have you ever actually shot that thing?

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: That 14 day backyard target practice that they make you do doesn’t count...

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Uhh, No I haven’t then… I think I did okay during that though!

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: That’s alright... I kinda saw that coming. If we’re gonna survive together you’re gonna have to learn to hunt. Follow my guidance and we’ll be okay.

mainDialogue.speaker: Jack
mainDialogue.speech: Alright, I can try my best...

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Alright kid, Take aim at that group of boars, they are slow moving compared to deer but they’ll hurt you when they’re pissed…

mainDialogue.speaker: John
mainDialogue.speech: Try to take out at least 2 of them, let’s see what you got.

idleDialogue.speaker: John
idleDialogue.speech: Aren't you hungry? We can't eat till you get me two boars. Get back to the hunt.
